excludeLowerPriorityProviders.title: Exclude lower priority providers
excludeLowerPriorityProviders.description: Whether to exclude lower priority providers (e.g. autocomplete-paths)

guess.title: Guess
guess.description: When completing a property and no completions are found, Tern will use some heuristics to try and return some properties anyway. Set this to false to turn that off.

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Determines whether the result set will be sorted.

caseInsensitive.title: Case-insensitive
caseInsensitive.description: Whether to use a case-insensitive compare between the current word and potential completions.

displayAboveSnippets.title: Display above snippets
displayAboveSnippets.description: Displays ternjs suggestions above snippet suggestions. Requires a restart.

useSnippetsAndFunction.title: Display both, autocomplete-snippets and function name
useSnippetsAndFunction.description: Choose to just complete the function name or expand the snippet

inlineFnCompletion.title: Display inline suggestions for function params
inlineFnCompletion.description: Displays a inline suggestion located right next to the current cursor

lint.title: Use tern-lint
lint.description: Use tern-lint to validate JavaScript files to collect semantic errors. Restart atom after this option has been changed.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Whether to include documentation string (if found) in the result data.

urls.title: Url
urls.description: Whether to include documentation urls (if found) in the result data.

origins.title: Origin
origins.description: Whether to include origins (if found) in the result data.
